p: Correlations between diversity estimates and soil characteristics were conducted by SPSS 20.0 for Windows. Nonmetric multidimensional scaling analyses were performed using vegan of R 2.3.0 ( 49), based on dissimilarity calculated using the Bray-Curtis index (rarefaction depth 3,000 sequences), and these summaries of community composition were associated with environmental factors (scaled by Euclidean geographic distance between sampling sites) by using the envfit and vif of vegan package and Mantel tests.
